message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to buy this incredible product from me. I believe it has the potential to revolutionize your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the potential of this product, but $900,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $800,000, which still represents a good deal for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that this product has immense value to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $850,000. I believe this is a fair compromise that benefits both of us.
